text: Ventavon is a commune in the Hautes-Alpes department. == Population == == Transport == === Road === The D21, D21A, D942 and D1085 roads pass through the commune. The A51 autoroute also passes through Ventavon. == Location == The commune borders the Alpes-de-Haute-Provence department. == References == Category:Communes in Hautes-Alpes
title: Ventavon
